InstanceOf

Check at run time if an object is an instance of a class.

This differs from comparing the result of type_id, as it takes inheritance into account. Note that base class must be polymorphic, that is it must have a virtual function or inherit from another class.

Parameters:
objPtr A pointer to the object to check. A pointer must be used, not an object. If necessary, generate an address.
The class name to test against.
Returns:
true if the object is an instance of the class.
#define InstanceOf(objPtr, className)   ((bool)(dynamic_cast<const className*>(objPtr) != NULL))
